price: Wale tulio wapa Kitabu kabla yake wanakiamini hiki.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ هُم بِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: Wale ambao tuliwateremshia Taurati na Injili kabla ya kuteremka Qur'ani, na wakaviamini vitabu hivyo viwili, na wakasadiki yaliyo tajwa humo juu ya khabari za Muhammad na Kitabu chake, hao wanamuamini Muhammad na Kitabu chake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna ātaynāhumu al-kitāba min qablihi hum bihi yu'minūna
